job_history.work_description: Maintains all purchase orders and vendor acknowledgements. Updates vendor weekly Open Order Reports with accurate ETA's in SAP. Requests component skus with _ItemSetUpGroup in Procurement Dept. Updates PIR and source list information (costs, lead times, specifications, MOQs, etc.) per supplier and maintaining Master Vendor Agreements and Insurance.

Initiated, facilitated, and moderated classroom discussions. Evaluated and graded students' class work, assignments, and papers. Prepared course materials such as syllabi, homework assignments, and handouts.

Supervised daily activities relating to operations, receiving, handling and distribution of rigid packaging. Facilitated weekly managers meetings between sales, operations & warehouse teams. Monitored daily and monthly reports of sales, forecasting, and expenses in order to meet annual budgets and goals.

Directly responsible for managing multiple core accounts for the purpose of providing excellent customer service. Entered all sales and purchase orders with accuracy according to customer specifications. Executed PO follow-up on a daily basis to insure all shipments were indeed on time and within conformance of customer/vendor expectations.

skills.name: Procurement
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with procurement processes, including managing purchase orders, vendor acknowledgements, and updating vendor information in SAP, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Supply Chain Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with managing daily operations, receiving, handling, and distribution of packaging materials, and monitoring daily and monthly reports to meet annual budgets and goals, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has supervised daily activities and facilitated weekly managers meetings, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience with providing excellent customer service, managing core accounts, and executing PO follow-up, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with managing daily operations, receiving, handling, and distribution of packaging materials, and monitoring daily and monthly reports to meet annual budgets and goals, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with managing multiple core accounts and executing PO follow-up, but lacks extensive experience with project management, indicating some practical experience.

skills.explanation: Has experience with managing daily activities, receiving, handling, and distribution of packaging materials, and monitoring daily and monthly reports, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience with initiating, facilitating, and moderating classroom discussions, and preparing course materials, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience with monitoring daily and monthly reports, but lacks extensive experience with data analysis, indicating some practical experience.

skills.explanation: Has experience with updating vendor weekly Open Order Reports with accurate ETA's in SAP, showing a solid working proficiency.
